title: Scalar Product of Vectors Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of dot products, their properties, and angle calculations.

questions.question: What is the dot product of (2, 3, 1) and (1, -1, 4)?
Which property does NOT hold for the dot product?
questions.explanation: The dot product is not associative: (a·b)·c is not defined.

questions.question: What does the dot product a·b = 0 indicate?
questions.explanation: When the dot product is zero, the vectors are perpendicular.

questions.question: What is cosθ equal to for unit vectors a and b?
What is the angle between vectors (1,0,0) and (0,1,0)?
